chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Beginning
chapters.content: You are standing at the entrance of the Mystery Forest. Do you wish to enter?

chapters.title: Chapter 2: Deeper Into the Forest
chapters.content: You walk deeper into the forest. Strange sounds echo around you. Do you explore further?

choices.text: Climb a tree to look around

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Turning Back
chapters.content: You decide to turn back. You are standing at the edge of the forest. What will you do?

choices.text: Go back to the forest entrance

chapters.title: Chapter 4: Searching for Another Path
chapters.content: You walk along the edge of the forest and find an old stone path. Do you follow it?

choices.text: Go back to the forest entrance

chapters.title: Chapter 5: Strange Sounds
chapters.content: You investigate the strange sounds, but you are faced with a wild animal. What do you do?

chapters.title: Chapter 6: Climbing the Tree
chapters.content: You climb the tree and see a clearing ahead. Do you jump down and explore?

choices.text: Jump down and explore the clearing
Stay in the tree and watch
Climb higher to get a better view
